description: Open source macOS Cursors with HiDPI Support.

installer.script: Get-ChildItem $dir -Directory | ForEach-Object { New-ItemProperty "HKCU:\Control Panel\Cursors\Schemes" -Name "$($_.Name) Cursors" -PropertyType String -Value "$($_.FullName)\Pointer.cur,$($_.FullName)\Help.cur,$($_.FullName)\Work.ani,$($_.FullName)\Busy.ani,$($_.FullName)\Cross.cur,$($_.FullName)\Text.cur,$($_.FullName)\Handwriting.cur,$($_.FullName)\Unavailable.cur,$($_.FullName)\Vert.cur,$($_.FullName)\Horz.cur,$($_.FullName)\Dgn1.cur,$($_.FullName)\Dgn2.cur,$($_.FullName)\Move.cur,$($_.FullName)\Alternate.cur,$($_.FullName)\Link.cur,$($_.FullName)\Pin.cur,$($_.FullName)\Person.cur,$($_.FullName)\Pan.cur,$($_.FullName)\Grabbing.cur,$($_.FullName)\Zoom-in.cur,$($_.FullName)\Zoom-out.cur" -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null }

uninstaller.script: Get-ChildItem $dir -Directory | ForEach-Object { Remove-ItemProperty "HKCU:\Control Panel\Cursors\Schemes" -Name "$($_.Name) Cursors" -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Out-Null }
